Package BESA.Remote

Interface AdmRemoteInterfaceBESA

All Superinterfaces:
Remote
All Known Implementing Classes:
AdmRemoteImpBESA
public interface AdmRemoteInterfaceBESA extends Remote
This class provides the interface that allows the handling of RPC.
Since:
JDK1.0
Version:
2.0, 11/01/11
Author:
SIDRe - Pontificia Universidad Javeriana, Takina - Pontificia Universidad Javeriana

  • Method Details

    • registerRemoteAdm

      void registerRemoteAdm(String admId, String admAlias, String ipAddress, int rmiPort) throws RemoteException
      Makes the registry of an remote BESA administrator.
      Parameters:
      admAlias - Alias/name of the admnistrador.
      ipAddress - The IP address of the machine that contains the administrator to be registered.
      rmiPort - The port of the machine that contains the administrator to be registered.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - Is generated by a number of communication-related exceptions that may occur during the execution of the remote method call.

    • registerRemoteAgent

      boolean registerRemoteAgent(String password, String administratorName, String aid) throws RemoteException
      Makes the remote registry of an agent in a BESA container.

      Creates the aid card.

      Does the agent lookup.
      Parameters:
      password - Password of the local administrator.
      administratorName - Name of the administrator.
      aid - Is a chain formed of the following way: IP + "." + port + "." + aid.
      Returns:
      true if the registry can be made; false otherwise.

      The registry of the agent can fail if the name of the administrator is not registered in the administrators table or if appears problems when doing the lookup (IP of the remote admnistrador, port of the remote administrator, aid).
      Throws:
      RemoteException - Is generated by a number of communication-related exceptions that may occur during the execution of the remote method call.

    • unregisterRemoteAgent

      void unregisterRemoteAgent(String password, String administratorName, String aid) throws RemoteException
      Eliminates the remote registry of an agent. To do this a null value is asigned to the aid card.
      Parameters:
      password - Password of the local administrator.
      administratorName - Name assigned to the administrator.
      aid - The identifier of the agent.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - Is generated by a number of communication-related exceptions that may occur during the execution of the remote method call.

    • createRemoteService

      void createRemoteService(String password, String servName, ArrayList descriptors) throws RemoteException
      Creates a remote service in a BESA container.
      Parameters:
      password - Password of the local administrator.
      servName - The oficial name of the service to be published.
      descriptors - A group of alias that describes the service.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - Is generated by a number of communication-related exceptions that may occur during the execution of the remote method call.

    • bindRemoteService

      boolean bindRemoteService(String password, String aid, String servName) throws RemoteException
      Binds a remote service associated to an agent.
      Parameters:
      password - Password of the local administrator.
      aid - The identifier of the agent.
      servName - The oficial name of the service.
      Returns:
      Throws:
      RemoteException - Is generated by a number of communication-related exceptions that may occur during the execution of the remote method call.

    • registerRemoteAgents

      void registerRemoteAgents(String agAlias, String agId, String admId) throws RemoteException
      Makes the remote registry of an agent in a BESA container.

      Creates the aid card.

      Does the agent lookup.
      Parameters:
      agAlias - Name of the agent with whom it will be identified in the BESA container.
      agId - The identifier of the agent.
      admId - The identifier of the BESA container.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - Is generated by a number of communication-related exceptions that may occur during the execution of the remote method call.

    • sendEvent

      void sendEvent(BESA.Kernel.Agent.Event.EventBESA ev, String aid) throws RemoteException
      Sends an event to an agent.
      Parameters:
      ev - The event BESA to be sending.
      aid - The identifier of the agent.

    • updateRemoteAgentDirectory

      void updateRemoteAgentDirectory(String admAlias, ArrayList agIdList, ArrayList agAliasList) throws RemoteException
      Updates the directories of identifiers and alias of agents in a remote BESA container.
      Parameters:
      admAlias - Alias/name of the admnistrador.
      agIdList - List of agents identifiers.
      agAliasList - List of agents names.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - Is generated by a number of communication-related exceptions that may occur during the execution of the remote method call.

    • synchronizeRemoteAgentDirectory

      void synchronizeRemoteAgentDirectory(String admId, ArrayList agIdList, ArrayList aliasList) throws RemoteException
      Synchronizes the infomaci�n of agents in the BESA containers assets.
      Parameters:
      admId - The identifier of the BESA container.
      agIdList - List of agents identifiers.
      aliasList - List of agents names.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - Is generated by a number of communication-related exceptions that may occur during the execution of the remote method call.

    • moveAgentReceive

      void moveAgentReceive(String aliasAg, BESA.Kernel.Agent.StateBESA stateAg, BESA.Kernel.Agent.StructBESA structAg, double passwdAg, String nameClassAgent) throws RemoteException
      Moves an external agent to the associated local container.
      Parameters:
      aliasAg - Name of the agent with whom it will be identified in the BESA container.
      stateAg - The agent associated state object.
      structAg - The agent associated structure.
      passwdAg - Agent password.
      nameClassAgent - A String that represents the agent associated class.
      Throws:
      RemoteException

    • moveAgentSend

      void moveAgentSend(String agId, String aliasDestinationAdm, double passwdAg) throws RemoteException
      Moves a local agent to an external BESA container.
      Parameters:
      agId - The identifier of the agent.
      aliasDestinationAdm - Alias/name of the destination admnistrador.
      passwdAg - Agent password.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - Is generated by a number of communication-related exceptions that may occur during the execution of the remote method call.
